<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"Entity id.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uri"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json-patch+json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"The entity request, containing the actual semantic data.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"op":{"type":"string","description":"The patch operation, example `add`.","enum":["add","remove","replace","move","copy","test","add","remove","replace"]},"path":{"type":"string","description":"The property to apply the operation, JSONPath formatted (leading slash) on, e.g. `/https://schema.org/image (note the leading slash)."},"value":{"type":"string"}},"title":"EntityPatchRequest"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
